301.storedString:
Press the reset button. You can drag the hue and luminance sliders to adjust the averages. The colors will change to satisfy the average constraints. The first drag event begins an edit constraint, so it will be slower than subsequent drag events.

You can also click a color, to select a new one for that field.

305.storedString:
this can be very slow.

This example uses Cassowary and edit constraints for the
